verses.content: LALPA chu ka hmangai a nih, ka râwl le Lunginsiet ka hninahai chu a ngai leiin.
Keia tieng a na a hung sit leiin, Ka dam sûng po po chun ama chu ko ka tih.
Thina hruihruolhai chun an mi zem a, Seol natnahai chun a mi man a, Lunginzîngna le lungngaina ka tuok a.
Chu phingle chun LALPA hming chu ka ko a, “Aw LALPA, lunginsiettakin ka hringna hi sanhim rawh,” tiin.
LALPA chu mi lunginsietthei le feltak a na, Anih, ei Pathien chu mi lainattheitak a nih.
LALPA chun mimâwlhai chu a humhim hlak a, Sukhnuoiin ka um a, ama chun a mi sandam tah a,
Aw ka hringna, i châwlnaa chun kîr nâwk rawh, LALPA chun i chungah ṭhatakin a thaw ta sih a.
Ka hringna hi thinaa inthawkin, Ka mithai hi mitthlia inthawkin, Ka kehai hi tlûknaa inthawk chun i sanhim sih a.
Mi hring rama hin, LALPA hmaah lêng ka tih.
Ka ring a, thu ka hril ding a ni hi, Nasataka sukrinumin ka um kha.
Ka hamhaiin, “Mi po po khêl an nih,” ka lo ti tah a.
Ka chunga a thil thaw ṭhat po po hi, LALPA kuomah ieng am pe ve thung ka ta aw?
Sandamna no lâng ka ta, LALPA hming chu ko ka tih.
Ka thutiemhai chu LALPA kuomah hlen ka ta, Anih, a mihai po po hmaa chun.
A mi inthienghai thina chu, LALPA ngai chun hlutak a nih.
Aw LALPA, i siehlaw ka ni tak zet el, I siehlaw i suoknu naupa chu ka na, Khuopa ka umnahai chu i mi sût tah a.
Lâwmthuhril inthawinahai chu inhlân ka ti cheh a, LALPA hming chu ko ka tih.
Ka thutiemhai chu LALPA kuomah hlen ka ta; Anih, a mihai po po hmaa chun,
LALPA biekin inhuonna sûng tuollaiah, Aw Jerusalem, i laitaka chun. LALPA chu inpâk ro.
